title: Person of Interest Series Finale Trailer (HD)
author: televisionpromosdb
comment: This show was just a little ahead of its time; Michael Emerson may have found his true calling later in life, but we're all the more fortunate that he did. He and Jim Caviezel have run the gamut of emotions and the gauntlet, as it were, to get to the finish line. This one is going on the blu-ray box set list. There's already a space for it on the blu-ray shelves.
It was a good journey. Really going to miss this show. :(
I'm trying to stop myself from crying...I finished the series just about 1 minute ago...man...this show shatters your heart...
Ma bros, Shaw standing over Root's grave.. My heart is in pieces.
Starting to think the only survivors are gonna be Bear and Shaw.
description:
Person of Interest 5x13 "Return 0" (Series Finale) Trailer - Finch, Reese, Fusco and Shaw embark on one last mission to prevent Samaritan from destroying The Machine and cementing its hold over mankind, on the series finale of PERSON OF INTEREST, Tuesday, June 21st on CBS. Subscribe for more Person of Interest season 5 videos in HD!
